<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>868</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Fractions Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre fracciones</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Chodáin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bruch-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu de Fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Das Frações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Delle Frazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων μερών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupil will examine his/her ability in fraction terminology and will learn some related facts</string>
            <string language="es">El alumno examinará su habilidad respecto a la terminología de las fracciones y aprenderá algunos datos prácticos relacionados.</string>
            <string language="ga">Scrúdóidh an dalta a c(h)umas i dtéarmaíocht codáin agus foghlaimeoidh sé/sí roinnt fíricí bainteacha.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Maths</string>
            <string language="es">Matemáticas</string>
            <string language="ga">Mata</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schüler überprüft seine/ihr Fähigkeit in 
der Bruchterminologie und erlernt einige in Verbindung stehende 
Tatsachen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'élève examinera ses capacités dans la 
terminologie de fraction et apprendra quelques faits relatifs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O aluno examinará his/her abilidade na 
terminologia da fração e aprenderá alguns fatos relacionados</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'allievo esaminerà la sua abilità nella 
terminologia della frazione ed imparerà alcuni fatti relativi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο μαθητής θα εξετάσει τη δυνατότητά του/της στην 
ορολογία μέρους και θα μάθει μερικά σχετικά γεγονότα</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Maths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la matematica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
